name: Cycling Industries Europe
legal: Association international sans but lucratif (international non profit)
membership: Contracted to operate the EU office of the European Cycle Logistics Federation
goal:
Our mission is to:

Grow cycling in Europe, for the benefit of society and the benefit of cycling businesses.
Deliver the private sector and technological contribution to growth of cycling in Europe by encouraging investment in products, services, innovation, research, advocacy and the development of the industries in the sector.
Support conditions for a positive business environment and successful investment climate for all companies in the cycling sector in Europe, creating investment, employment and growth.
Work in partnership with other stakeholders such as civil society, other business sectors and global partners.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Mobility, mobility for growth
Industrial policy in all areas
Research and innovation
Horizon Europe
Small and medium enterprises
Regional policy for industry and mobility
